title: Episode 282: Le Tigre

title: Episode 281: Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young

title: Marilyn Manson Drops Lawsuit Against Evan Rachel Wood, Agrees to Pay Legal Fees
description: The rock musician sued Wood and Illma Gore in 2022, alleging that they conspired to cast him publicly “as a rapist and abuser”

title: Drake, in Second Action Against Universal Music Group, Claims Kendrick Lamar’s “Not Like Us” Is Defamatory
description: After a petition alleging that Universal Music Group and Spotify conspired to boost its streams, Drake alleges that the diss track “falsely [accuses] him of being a sex offender”
author: Jazz Monroe

title: Music industry backs new ‘TRAIN Act’ requiring transparency in materials used to train AI
description: The law would require AI companies to disclose whether or not they used copyrighted works at the request of rightsholders Source
author: Daniel Tencer

title: Drake files ANOTHER legal petition over Not Like Us; accuses Universal of ‘inappropriate business practices’ including a ‘payola’ scheme to turn Kendrick Lamar’s diss track into a mega-hit. Read the full filing.
description: 'The suggestion that UMG would do anything to undermine any of its artists is offensive and untrue,' said a UMG spokesperson in response to the first filing on Monday (November 25) Source
